CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: PhotoCatalog will not run on boot
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Start on Boot
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: PhotoCatalog will start logging on boot

CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOff: PhotoCatalog will not upload GPS log
CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Automatically Upload
CheckBoxPreference.android:summaryOn: PhotoCatalog will automaticaly upload GPS log
